channel.title: Sensor 21 on Afrikaniz3D Blogfolio
channel.description: Recent content in Sensor 21 on Afrikaniz3D Blogfolio

item.title: Been Busy
item.description: I got to learn my modest way around geometry nodes while developing HEXES Mini Pack 04: Electronic Devices. I started work on it in January and was having trouble deciding how many to produce and the style to make them in. Using geonodes made it feel more flexible and user-friendly. The first project was Sensor 21, based on an air quality dataset I explored for a portfolio project.

item.title: Still
item.description: Might just be the combination of things Iâ€™ve been focusing on lately, but finding a good fit is shifting more and more. So much changes in a month that the draft 2 weeks is so different to the draft of the night before. Found a way to make the data explorations more interesting while also getting to make new stuff as well as following through with older ideas. Nothing goes to waste. This will also let me get more content on LinkedIn.
